summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsSustainable PackagingSwipe on Benefit's bestselling* mascara BADgal BANG! in the BANGIN' Lashes Mascara Set for intense pitch black lashes, 360 degree fullness, and 36-hour** full-blast volume. No smudging, no flaking - just bigger, BADder, bolder lashes.
details: DetailsIncludesFull Size BADgal BANG! BIGGER, BADDER Volumizing Mascara in Intense Pitch BlackMini BADgal BANG! BIGGER, BADDER Volumizing Mascara in Intense Pitch BlackBenefitsVolumizingLongwearingWater ResistantSmudge ProofFlake-FreeBuildableItem 2639825How To UseWiggle brush from base to tips. Use quick strokes to build volume.IngredientsAqua (Water), Cera Alba (Beeswax), Paraffin, Glyceryl Stearate, Butylene Glycol, Acrylates Copolymer, Candelilla Cera (Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax), Cera Carnauba (Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax), Steareth-21, Vp/Eicosene Copolymer, Palmitic Acid, Polybutene, Stearic Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Steareth-2, Aminomethyl Propanediol, Panthenol, Caprylyl Glycol, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Silica Silylate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Disodium Phosphate, Sodium Phosphate, Polysorbate 60. May Contain: Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides).Disclaimer: Product ingredient listings are updated periodically. Before using a Benefit product, please read the ingredient list on the packaging of your product to be sure that the ingredients are appropriate for your personal use.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Wiggle brush from base to tips. Use quick strokes to build volume.
ingredients: Polysorbate 60. May Contain: Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides).Disclaimer: Product ingredient listings are updated periodically. Before using a Benefit product

reviews.headline: I would definitely be buying this again
reviews.comments: My eyes water a lot and this mascara made it look like I had on fake lashes. Love Love Love

reviews.headline: One of my "Go-To" Mascaras!!!
reviews.comments: I LOVE this particular mascara!! I keep coming back to it again & again, but swap between this & the Tarte XL Tubing Mascara. The ONLY issue I have with this one is that my lower lashes tend to "bleed off" a bit under my lashes. It's only because I live in SouthWest Florida & it's 9,000 degrees outside & my face sweats.

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: My lashes are super long and full

reviews.headline: I will buy this mascara again
reviews.comments:
This is my favorite mascara.
I have very few and small eyelashes and this mascara really extends my eyelashes without getting clumpy.
